page.title: 14SHOPS IN WOOLACOMBE
page.content: There are a number of shops in Woolacombe, catering both for the summer visitors and for the locals throughout the year. Shops open all year round include 2 Grocery shops, Post Office, Dairy, Newsagents, Butchers, Laundrette and Garage. Other shops open on a part-time basis over the winter include the Chemists, a craft shop, an off- licence, a sweetshop, a green- grocers and a fish and chip shop. During the summer, however, a large number of other shops open for the tourists - cafes, gifts, clothing shops, beach goods, newspapers, etc. One centre for the tourists is the Red Barn, a cafe near the beach where holidaymakers can sit outside in the sun enjoying the scene and the stalls nearby.
